thread.title: Paris is most popular destination for first-time travelers — survey
thread.title_full: Paris is most popular destination for first-time travelers — survey

title: Paris is most popular destination for first-time travelers — survey
text:
Paris is most popular destination for first-time travelers — survey AFP Relaxnews / 11:42 AM March 24, 2017 The Louvre, Paris. Image: andreykrav/istock.com via AFP Relaxnews 
When it comes to breaking into the world of travel, Europe holds the biggest appeal, according to a new survey of first-time travel. 
In a Booking.com poll that asked 15,000 travelers to name the destination that became their first travel experience, nine of the top 10 spots were in Europe, with Paris leading the way. 
The survey was conducted in January across 20 markets worldwide. ADVERTISEMENT 
Here are the top 10 most popular first-time travel destinations: 
1. Paris, France
